content:
Krautenfeld family

1 Leybel Herschel KRAUTENFELD        c1760 - 1832 #284
 + Lai                               c1764 - 1830 #213 (Majer)
  2o Kreindel KRAUTENFELD            1795-96
    * Eisyk HASS                     1793-94
          married Mar 16, 1812 #4
  2o Malka KRAUTENFELD               1799
    * Samson LANDAU                  1797-99
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Majer KRAUTENFELD               1804 - after 1880
    + Rebeka Syssla REISFELD /DROBNER  1813 #103
          banns 1834 #81
    + Sara REINER                    1819 - before 1877
          banns Dec 24, 1837 #100,  married 1838 Paris?

        4x Adolf KEMPLER             May 15, 1892 #337

        4x Adolf KRAUTENFELD         Oct 4, 1881 Tarnow - after 1941
